mapper.insert: insert into assos(MENO, MNO, ASSO, A_PHOT, HINT, DATE, BEST, LIKES, HATES, FAVOR, A_THUM) values((select MENO from MEANS where mean=#{mean} and word=#{word}), #{mno}, #{asso}, #{assophotPath}, #{hint}, now(), 'N', 0, 0, 'N', #{assothumPath});
mapper.select: select * from my_LOH where mno=#{mno} and ano=(select ano from assos where asso=#{asso})
select likes from my_LOH where mno=#{mno} and ano=(select ano from assos where asso=#{asso})
select hates from my_LOH where mno=#{mno} and ano=(select ano from assos where asso=#{asso})
mapper.update: update assos set hates=hates+1 where asso=#{asso};
update assos set likes=likes+1 where asso=#{asso};
update my_loh set likes=1 where mno=#{mno} and ano=(select ano from assos where asso=#{asso})
update my_loh set hates=1 where mno=#{mno} and ano=(select ano from assos where asso=#{asso})
mapper.select: SELECT W.WORD, M.MEAN, A.ASSO, A.LIKES, A.HATES, A.A_PHOT, R.PHOT, A.FAVOR, R.NIC, A.DATE, A.A_THUM, A.ANO FROM WORDS W, MEANS M, ASSOS A, MEMBERS R WHERE W.WORD = M.WORD AND M.MENO = A.MENO AND A.MNO = R.MNO AND W.WORD = #{word} order by A.LIKES DESC
